ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Leaving EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: And perhaps you should stop playing police-man and mind your own business. Just a thought! ... From: Lance Whitmore [mailto:vesuvus@yahoo.com] Sent: Wednesday,
ygData.messageBody:
And perhaps you should stop playing police-man and mind your own business.
Just a thought!



-----Original Message-----
From: Lance Whitmore [mailto:vesuvus@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 07, 2001 2:10 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Leaving EQ



When did this Everquest Information ListServ become a
host for the illegal selling of accounts.. hehe.. If
you wish to sell your account please do so elsewell..
this board for those who wish to play and information
about the game. This is not a location for the
advertising or selling of accounts. =)

Thanks

Might want to click on the use of Yahoo! Groups at the
bottom of the message =)

-----Original Message-----
From: KChristie@... [mailto:KChristie@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 07, 2001 2:33 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Leaving EQ


Well, my friends and I have all purchased motorcycles
and as a
result, we al
will be selling our accounts. Here is just a very
rough overview of
what we
have:
ALL SEVENTH HAMMER SERVER

43rd Cleric, Dwarf [male](all twink non plane gear.
199wis, Dark
Ember, Belt
of Cenobite, Cleric Bracers, DWB's etc.)
43rd Warrior, Dwarf [male](Wyrmslayer, Shimmering
Partisain, FBSS,
Mithril
BP, Silver leggings, etc.)
40th Enchanter, Gnome [male](Twinked....Blackened
Crystalline robe)
43rd Warrior, Dwarf [female](Wyrmslayer, Cane of
Tranquil, FBSS,
Mithril BP
etc.)
49th Druid, half-elf [male](stripped)
49th Wizard, High-Elf [female] (stripped)

Let me know if any of these peek your interest.

~Kris
